DataElement.preferredDefinition: A piece of glass or plastic on which different samples have been affixed at separate locations in an ordered manner thus forming a microscopic array.  The samples are usually DNA fragments but may also be antibodies, other proteins, or tissues.:The act of working out the form of something (as by making a sketch or outline or plan) or the result of this activity._The determination of the amount of a particular constituent of a mixture or of the biological or pharmacological potency of a drug.:Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities._Specifies the biological information reported by a microarray.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A piece of glass or plastic on which different samples have been affixed at separate locations in an ordered manner thus forming a microscopic array.  The samples are usually DNA fragments but may also be antibodies, other proteins, or tissues.:The act of working out the form of something (as by making a sketch or outline or plan) or the result of this activity._The determination of the amount of a particular constituent of a mixture or of the biological or pharmacological potency of a drug.:Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A piece of glass or plastic on which different samples have been affixed at separate locations in an ordered manner thus forming a microscopic array.  The samples are usually DNA fragments but may also be antibodies, other proteins, or tissues.:The act of working out the form of something (as by making a sketch or outline or plan) or the result of this activity.

Concepts.definition: A piece of glass or plastic on which different samples have been affixed at separate locations in an ordered manner thus forming a microscopic array.  The samples are usually DNA fragments but may also be antibodies, other proteins, or tissues.
The act of working out the form of something (as by making a sketch or outline or plan) or the result of this activity.

Property.preferredDefinition: The determination of the amount of a particular constituent of a mixture or of the biological or pharmacological potency of a drug.:Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.

Concepts.definition: A qualitative or quantitative analysis performed to determine the amount of a particular constituent in a sample or the biological or pharmacological properties of a drug.
Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: DEC Released following Silver Compatibility Review and by direction of VCDE workspace.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Specifies the biological information reported by a microarray.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A variation of a single nucleotide at a specific location of the genome due to base substitution, present at an appreciable frequency between individuals of a single interbreeding population.

Concepts.definition: A variation of a single nucleotide at a specific location of the genome due to base substitution, present at an appreciable frequency between individuals of a single interbreeding population.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The sequences of a gene that are present in the final, mature, spliced messenger RNA molecule from that gene.

Concepts.definition: The sequences of a gene that are present in the final, mature, spliced messenger RNA molecule from that gene.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Typically involves transcription of genetically encoded information into an intermediary message (messenger RNA) and subsequent translation into a functional protein.

Concepts.definition: Typically involves transcription of genetically encoded information into an intermediary message (messenger RNA) and subsequent translation into a functional protein.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: An organizational header for concepts representing mostly abstract entities.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Type; a subdivision of a particular kind of thing.

Concepts.definition: Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Released workflow status per 7/13/09 request of VCDE following successful Silver Compatibility review.

ClassificationSchemes.longName: GenePattern Based Copy Number Analytical Service
